claim: the average attendance for game play in the month of may at the eternal derby (croatia) be 22666

2. Filter out only the rows where both teams are involved. This results in a total of 18 games (since there are multiple instances where the Derby was played more than once in a month).

4. Calculate the sum of attendance for all the May games by adding up the 'attendance' values in the relevant cells.
5. Divide the total sum by the number of games (step 3 result) to get the average attendance for May games.
